originalText.text: Mr. Malik Taylor's service, professionalism and patience was the best, especially at a time when my own patience was running thin.  I actually found them calming. Add to that, their costs was very reasonable. I would hope no one would ever need their service but that's not reality. When you do, I highly recommend Funerals by Design, Inc.

text.text: Mr. Malik Taylor's service, professionalism and patience was the best, especially at a time when my own patience was running thin.  I actually found them calming. Add to that, their costs was very reasonable. I would hope no one would ever need their service but that's not reality. When you do, I highly recommend Funerals by Design, Inc.

originalText.text: Started the process of arrangements a year and a half ago for my mother. Mr. Taylor was so helpful and kind.  In late September 2022 when my mother passed my sister followed up for cremation and Mr. Taylor was on it with arrangements and was comforting to her.  I came in from Miami to pick up the ashes and fell ill in the morning and Mr. Taylor took the drive to deliver them to me.  I am so grateful. Funerals By Design delivered love and peace during a time of great sadness for my family.  I highly recommend.  My family is grateful to Mr. Malik Taylor and his staff.  With His Love, David

originalText.text: Our experience with Funerals by Design was held with the greatest sensitivity. Thank you Malik and company for providing your expertise and 24/7 attention.

text.text: Our experience with Funerals by Design was held with the greatest sensitivity. Thank you Malik and company for providing your expertise and 24/7 attention.

originalText.text: My family entrusted Funerals By Design Inc. to take care of the Home Going Services for my Uncle.  Malik Taylor was very helpful and personable and went above and beyond on what would be necessary from beginning until the finalization of the services.   Malik provided clear explanations of services rendered to my family and was available at any time to answer our phone calls where appropriated.  I would highly recommend Funerals By Design Inc. to anyone who is seeking Funeral Arrangements with the level of dignity and compassion that Malik afforded my family.

originalText.text: Funerals By Design answered my call immediately and walked us through the “direct cremation” process step by step, efficiently and with compassion; making a sad and emotionally challenging process, as smooth as can be under the circumstances. Thank you, Mr. Taylor from me and my family.
